passes.description: Ensures the order of headings is semantically correct

ancestry: html > body > div:nth-child(2) > div > div > div:nth-child(3) > h1:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(2) > div > div > div:nth-child(3) > form:nth-child(4) > div:nth-child(2) > h2:nth-child(1)
